docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, June 28.--Pancho Villa threatens to force American intervention, General Enriquez stated yesterday, shortly after his arrival in Mexico City to confer with General Calles and arrange proper protection along the border.

headline.main: SAYS VILLA AIMS AT INTERVENTION; But Enriquez, Candidate, for Governor of Chihuahua, Thinks Bandit's End Near. COURTS OUR FRIENDSHIP Enriquez Paints Glowing Picture of Future Co-operation Between the Two Countries.

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, June 28.--Pancho Villa threatens to force American intervention, General Enriquez stated yesterday, shortly after his arrival in Mexico City to confer with General Calles and arrange proper protection along the border.
